LaunchScreen
Main
Hushh needs camera access to take photos for your profile, scan QR codes, and capture images for sharing. Your photos remain private and are used only within the app.
Hushh uses microphone access for voice input features, audio messages, and enhanced communication capabilities. Audio is processed securely.
Hushh uses location access to provide location-based features, nearby services, and improve your experience with local content.
Hushh uses location access to provide location-based features and improve your experience with local content.
Hushh needs access to your contacts to help you connect with people you know and share cards easily. Your contacts are kept private and secure.
Hushh needs access to your photo library to upload profile pictures, share images, and access media for your content.
Hushh needs permission to save photos and media to your photo library for easy access and sharing.
Hushh uses notifications to keep you updated about new messages, card shares, and important updates. Enable notifications to stay connected.
Hushh may use Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices and enhance your experience with location-based features.
Hushh may use Bluetooth to connect with compatible devices and improve app functionality.
Hushh uses speech recognition to provide voice-to-text features and improve your interaction with the app.
Hushh uses Face ID for secure authentication and to protect your sensitive information within the app.
Hushh may use motion data to enhance user experience and provide activity-based features.
Hushh may access your calendar to help schedule events and integrate with your daily activities.
Hushh may access your reminders to help you stay organized and manage your tasks effectively.
